text: inya wede nuḥina kerisu beḫwala wede neberuti nebīyati inidaweredini wede ānitemi āweredini፡፡ wede ībirahīmimi፣ wede īsima‘īlimi፣ wede īsiḥak’imi፣ wede ya‘ik’obimi፣ wede negedochumi፣ wede ‘īsami፣ wede āyubimi፣ wede yunusimi፣ wede harunina፣ wede suleyimanimi āweredini፡፡ ledawidimi zeburini set’enewi፡፡
